review.comment: Professional. Efficient. Personable. The team at Cernitz Law executed my claim expeditiously and fairly. Highly recommend their services.
review.review_reply: Hi, Guillermo. Thanks for taking the time to share your positive experience. We truly appreciate it!

review.comment:
I would highly recommend this firm if you want a quick and successful resolution of your insurance claims.  They immediately processed the information that I provided and got me the payments in a timely manner.
The entire staff is extremely professional and eager to help.
Thank you, Cernitz Law!
review.review_reply: Hi, Rosa. We are thrilled to learn that you had a positive experience with us!
Hi, Natasha. We must have done something right to get such a good rating from you. We really appreciate you taking the time!

review.comment: Cernitz got me a quick and fair settlement.  He took on the "Big" insurance and won a quick settlement with no cost to me.  Wonderful recovery which I never really expected.

After a denial of a claim by our home insurance company, Justin took the case, resolved the claim in our favor and provided us with a very satisfactory settlement.  I highly recommend Cernitz Law firm to fight for the client against insurance companies that do not protect their customers. Justin. Thank you so much. Ben G.

(Translated by Google) Cernitz is one of the MOST lawyers! A team that truly meets and honestly, I recommend, Salvador Blanco!

(Original)
Cernitz is one of the most lawyers! Un equipo que de verdad resuelve y con honestidad, yo lo recomiendo, Salvador Blanco!
Very Knowledgeable Attorneys.They know how to get things done with solid results.
Great service very reliable. If you want things done right and with results as soon as possible go to Mr. Cernitz. Nicole was a great help and vey responsive as well. Great law firm very happy.

Cernitz Shanbron did an excellent job representing us on a property and casualty insurance matter and I wouldn't hesitate to engage them again in the future.  They were extremely professional and we were very pleased with our results.
Very professional, answered all our questions always responded in a timely manner .  Accomplished what he said he would do .  Very happy with the service we received .

Great knowledgeable attorneys who get you winning results!  The insurance company denied my homeowner’s property damage claim leaving me with the bill for the repairs. Justin personally handled my case, answered all my questions and got me a great settlement. I definitely recommend Cernitz & Shanbron.

Justin Cernitz
I would definitely describe you as personable, compassionate, sincere and a brilliant negotiator!
You masterfully performed and strategically described the different scenarios with the best possible outcome to the teeth and accurately delivered!! When other attorneys refused to take my Insurance claim case against all odds you were willing to fight it and winning. Therefore, My family and I are forever grateful!!! Thank you!
